mapper.select: select wu.*,a1.full_name area,GROUP_CONCAT(r.name) rname from web_user wu LEFT JOIN xx_area a1 ON wu.userArea = a1.id LEFT JOIN t_webuser_role wr ON wu.userId = wr.webuserid LEFT JOIN t_role r ON wr.roleId = r.id GROUP BY wu.userId
mapper.delete: delete from web_user where userId in (${id})
mapper.select: select wr.roleId from t_webuser_role wr where wr.webuserid = #{id}

SELECT p.ident from t_webuser_role wr LEFT JOIN t_role r ON wr.roleId = r.id LEFT JOIN t_role_power rp ON rp.roleId = r.id LEFT JOIN t_power p ON rp.powerId=p.id where wr.webuserid=#{value} and p.id is not null

select a.*,a2.name as shiname,a2.id AS shiId,a3.id as shenId,a3.name as shengname,a1.name as quname from web_user a LEFT JOIN xx_area a1 ON a.userArea=a1.id LEFT JOIN xx_area a2 ON a1.parent =a2.id LEFT JOIN xx_area a3 ON a3.id=a2.parent where a.userId= #{value}
select userPwd from web_user where userId=#{value}
mapper.update: update web_user set userPwd=#{pwd} where userId=#{id}
